item.title: Creating this website with Hugo and Github
item.description: So I just finished publishing this website without errors and I thought I would document it here. To my pleasant surprise, It was pretty straightforward. I followed these steps: I followed the first few steps directly from the getting started guide of hugo, where I installed it using brew, created an empty site and initialized it with git. Now this second part is really really hard, which involves choosing a theme.
